feed.title: Gravity Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.6.18
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.6.18

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.6.18

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.6.18

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.6.17...v0.6.18

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.6.19
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.6.19

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.6.19

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.6.19

What's Changed

  • Bump go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/google.golang.org/grpc/otelgrpc from 0.25.0 to 0.46.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/763
  • Bump prettier from 3.0.3 to 3.1.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/765
  • Bump @trivago/prettier-plugin-sort-imports from 4.2.1 to 4.3.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/764
  • docs/dhcp: document default DHCP option values by @tigattack in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/766
  • docs: additions, fixes, and improvements by @tigattack in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/767
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 6.10.0 to 6.11.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/770
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 6.10.0 to 6.11.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/769
  • Bump github.com/miekg/dns from 1.1.56 to 1.1.57 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/773

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.6.18...v0.6.19

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.7.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.7.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.7.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.7.0

What's Changed

  • update background by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/778
  • Fix API Role restart by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/779
  • update lease when device moves to different network by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/777
  • More consistent formatting by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/780

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.6.19...v0.7.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.8.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.8.0

npm i gravity-api@0.8.0

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.8.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.8.1
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.8.1

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.8.1

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.8.1
